summary_text: In the sci-fi thriller The Philadelphia Experiment the sole survivor of a wartime experiment is catapulted 41 years into the future and must race to save the world as we know it. It's now 10 years later- 1993.

name: Watermelon Man
summary_text: An extremely bigoted white man finds out the hard (and somewhat humorous) way what it's like being a black man, firsthand!

name: The Mountain
summary_text: Selfish Chris Teller pressures his older brother, a retired climber, to accompany him on a treacherous Alpine climb to loot the bodies of plane crash victims.

name: Charlie Chan in Egypt
summary_text: While investigating the theft of antiquities from an ancient tomb excavation, Charlie discovers that the body of the expedition's leader concealed inside the mummy's wrappings.

name: 438 dagar
summary_text: On the eve of June 28th, 2011 Swedish journalists Martin Schibbye and Johan Persson put everything at stake by illegally crossing the border from Somalia into Ethiopia. After months of ...                See full summary »

name: Hello!
summary_text: Avinash (Akhil Akkineni) in his childhood meets a girl (Kalyani Priyadarshan as Junnu) and believes that she is his soulmate, and patiently waits to come across her even after growing into an adult. Will they meet again?

name: Peelers
summary_text: A small town strip club owner must defend her bar, her strippers and her life when violent infected patrons show up on the final closing night and all hell breaks loose.

name: Angels Crest
summary_text: The disappearance of a 3-year-old boy divides a tightly knit community and culls out its secrets.

name: Las 13 rosas
summary_text: True story of thirteen totally normal young women that suffered harsh questioning and were put in prison under made up charges of helping the rebellion against Franco back in the 1940's. ...                See full summary »

name: Comfort and Joy
summary_text: Alan Bird witnesses how an ice cream van is attacked and destroyed by an angry competitor. This leads him into the struggle between two Italian families, the Bernardis and the Rossis, over whose ice cream vans can sell where in Glasgow.

name: Five Star Final
summary_text: The City Editor of a sleazy tabloid goes against his own journalistic ethics to resurrect a twenty year old murder case... with tragic results.

name: Jack Whitehall: At Large
summary_text: Fresh from hosting the Royal Variety Performance and starring in Bad Education and A League Of Their Own, this is your chance to catch Jack at his dynamic best.

name: Hala
summary_text: Muslim teenager Hala copes with the unraveling of her family as she comes into her own.

name: Youngistaan
summary_text: Follow the highs and lows in the life of Abhimanyu who is forced to join Indian politics after his father, the Prime Minister of India, suddenly passes away.

name: Norte, the End of History
summary_text: An embittered law student commits a brutal double murder; a family man takes the fall and is forced into a harsh prison sentence; a mother and her two children wander the countryside looking for some kind of redemption.

name: All for Two
summary_text: After their newfound fortune have been tricked away from them by a banker, the three friends must work together to get revenge.

name: Kya Dilli Kya Lahore
summary_text: In 1948, a cross-fire erupts at an isolated stretch of Indo-Pak border, leaving only two soldiers alive. One is an Indian soldier of Pakistani origin while the other happens to be a ...                See full summary »

name: War of the Buttons
summary_text: In the countryside of France, two groups of boys from the rural villages of Longeverne and Velran are in constant war against each other. Their war is a tradition that passes from father to...                See full summary »

name: Carrie Fisher: Wishful Drinking
summary_text: Hollywood icon Carrie Fisher tells her raw and intoxicating true story in this documentary based on her hit stage production. Touching on stardom, mental illness, addiction and more, the ...                See full summary »

name: Daddy Longlegs
summary_text: A father juggling his kids with the rest of his responsibilities is ultimately faced with the choice of being their father or their friend.

name: Dasharatham
summary_text: Rajeev, an orphan eccentric millionaire, has his own strange taste towards everything. With less knowledge about family relationships, he struggles hard to achieve his aim to become a father without marrying.

name: Basil
summary_text: A lonely young aristocrat in turn-of the century England stuggles to meet the approval of his over-bearing, class-conscious father while trying to please the selfish woman he loves.

name: Zero Kelvin
summary_text: A young writer whose proposal was recently rejected goes to Greenland to spend a year at an outpost for hunting and trapping animals for furs. At the outpost he meets two men who are none too keen to spend the winter with the newcomer.

name: Sarafina!
summary_text: South African teenagers fight against apartheid in the Soweto Uprising.

name: Smithereens
summary_text: A talent-challenged girl tries to promote herself to stardom in New York's waning punk music world.

name: The Best of Everything
summary_text: An expose of the lives and loves of Madison Avenue working girls and their higher ups.

name: Come and Get It
summary_text: An ambitious lumberjack abandons his saloon girl lover so that he can marry into wealth, but years later becomes infatuated with the woman's daughter.

name: The Shed
summary_text: A hunter gets bitten by a vampire and runs into a shed to avoid sunlight. Stan, a 17 y.o. on probation, and his supervisor grandpa live next to it. Stan's bullied high school buddy can use a monster.

name: Çakallarla Dans 4
summary_text: 5 best friends, in search of finding ways to get rich, finaly find a lot of gold in the forest. Just as they think they finally did it, they get in trouble with a German godfather who ...                See full summary »

name: Rendel: Dark Vengeance
summary_text: A Finnish superhero, a masked vigilante Rendel seeks for revenge and fights against VALA, the huge criminal organization.

name: 5 cm
summary_text: Five best friends try to find out what true friendship is by climbing Mount Semeru, the highest peak in Java.

name: Half of a Yellow Sun
summary_text: Sisters Olanna and Kainene return home to 1960s Nigeria, where they soon diverge on different paths. As civil war breaks out, political events loom larger than their differences as they join the fight to establish an independent republic.

name: Le Donk & Scor-zay-zee
summary_text: Rock roadie, Le Donk, has lived, loved and learned. Along the way, he's lost a classy girlfriend but gained a sidekick, Scorz-Ayz-Ee. He sets out to make Scorz a star with a little help from the Artic Monkeys.

name: Kolobos
summary_text: Night. Rain splatters the city. A young couple out for a drive take a shortcut through a deserted alley and makes a gruesome discovery: a girl, savagely slashed and battered, lies in a pool...                See full summary »

name: Moebius
summary_text: A train on the Buenos Aires subway system suddenly vanishes.

name: Let's Rob the Bank
summary_text: A grouchy shopkeeper made an unsuccessful financial investment, and now he is on the verge of bankruptcy. In order to avenge oneself he engages his own family into a plan to rob a next door bank.

name: Queen Bee
summary_text: A young woman arrives at the home of her socialite cousin, and soon finds herself sucked into the woman's complex web of deceit.

name: Blood on the Sun
summary_text: A dedicated American reporter in 1930s Japan is determined to expose that government's plan for world domination.

name: Morto Não Fala
summary_text: Stênio, the nightshifter of a morgue, has the ability to communicate with the cadavers that are brought to him every night.

name: The Workshop
summary_text: The scene is set one Summer in La Ciotat, a town near Marseille which used to be prosperous thanks to its huge dockyard but has been in decline since its closing 25 years before. It is in ...                See full summary »

name: Perfect Match
summary_text: Forced to work together, two event planners learn that opposites can produce the most unexpected results.

name: Family Guy 100th Episode Special
summary_text: The creator of "Family Guy" hosts a look at some of the funniest moments from the first 100 episodes of the show.

name: Rosso come il cielo
summary_text: A nearly sightless boy is sent to a school for blind children, where he secretly discovers the possibilities of the recorded sound.

name: Return to the Batcave: The Misadventures of Adam and Burt
summary_text: When the Batmobile is stolen, Adam West and Burt Ward search for it while remembering their days as the stars of the Batman live action series.

name: L'étudiante
summary_text: Weeks from her final exams, part-time teacher Valentine meets a very different musician. Just a one-night stand and back to preparing for exams, she thinks.

name: Coming Home for Christmas
summary_text: Lizzie Richfield lands a job as house manager for the exquisite Ashford Estate in Virginia. While preparing the place for sale, Lizzie plans one final Christmas Eve gala for the Marley family, though they seem to be a family in name only.

name: Finding Father Christmas
summary_text: Raised by her mother, but orphaned at a young age at Christmas, Miranda finds a clue that will take her to the truth about her father. Along the way, she finds romance and rekindles her Christmas spirit.

name: Akaash Vani
summary_text: Follows the love story of a boy and a girl.

name: Now You See Him, Now You Don't
summary_text: A chemistry student invents a spray that makes its wearer invisible. A crook finds out about it, and plans to steal it for himself.

name: Daikaijû kûchûsen: Gamera tai Gyaosu
summary_text: Gamera's back, and just in time to save Japan from Gaos, a mysterious bat-like creature awakened by a volcanic eruption. As in the first Gamera movie, a young boy establishes an emotional ...                See full summary »

name: Behold a Pale Horse
summary_text: Famous Spanish bandit Artiguez returns to his native Spanish village after 20 years in French exile but Spanish cop Vinolas is setting a trap for him.

name: Kenny Sebastian: Don't Be That Guy
summary_text: In this stand up special, Kenny talks about his experiences on turning 26, being a former 'nice' guy and his hilarious experiences with his maids.

name: Mu ji zhe
summary_text: The story about an ambitious journalist who eagerly pursues a long-forgotten accident. When the sole survivor of the accident suddenly disappears, he realizes that nothing is what it seems, and the unimaginable dark truth will haunt him for the rest of his life.

name: The Offering
summary_text: When young and successful reporter Jamie finds out that her sister has died in mysterious circumstances, she travels to Singapore to uncover the truth. There, she discovers multiple deaths ...                See full summary »

name: Dirty Teacher
summary_text: A high school senior becomes the victim of an elaborate frame-up after learning that her boyfriend is sleeping with their teacher.

name: Mr. Fix It
summary_text: A man who tricks women into returning to their ex-boyfriends soon finds himself falling for one of his marks.

name: The Adventures of Sebastian Cole
summary_text: In June, 1983, in Dutchess County, New York, Sebastian Cole joins his mother, step-father, and sister for dinner. Hank, Sebastian's step-father, drops a bomb: he announces he's changing ...                See full summary »

name: The Treasure of Swamp Castle
summary_text: In the turmoilous 18th century, young poor Hungarian aristocrat Jonas helps Szaffi, a young pretty gypsy Romani girl and the illegitimate daughter of a Turkish pasha, get the treasure that's owed to her by the right of inheritance.

name: A Geisha
summary_text: A seasoned geisha and her apprentice maiko are forced to give in to their clients' sexual advances to survive.

name: Gurgaon
summary_text: Based on true event this story revolves around kidnapping of Preeto which family has come to know from midnight call. The tales revolves as to how they family will be able to track Preeto..

name: Siren
summary_text: Strange goings on ensue, when a few friends on a sailboat find an island with a beautiful lone female inhabitant.

name: Li xiao long
summary_text: The life story of martial arts icon and actor Bruce Lee.

name: The Ferryman
summary_text: The story of a group of twenty-somethings who charter a boat to Fiji for the trip of a lifetime, before stumbling upon an evil that demands vengeance at any cost.

name: Corridors of Blood
summary_text: Dr. Thomas Bolton fights for the use of anesthetic in surgery and uses himself as a guinea pig, but soon finds himself addicted.

name: Kim
summary_text: During the British Raj, the orphan of a British soldier poses as a Hindu and is torn between his loyalty to a Buddhist mystic and aiding the English secret service.

name: Thaandavam
summary_text: The identity of a blind church pianist is uncovered. Military officer Shiva Kumar is on the run as an accused fugitive, and is attempting to take revenge against those who killed his wife.

name: Dragon Ball: Makafushigi Dai Bôken
summary_text: Emperor Chiaotzu's wife has gone missing, and he is told by Master Shen that if he collects the seven dragon balls he can call upon the eternal dragon and wish for her return. Meanwhile, ...                See full summary »

name: Murderers' Row
summary_text: Handsome top-secret American agent Matt Helm must recover a laser-weapons inventor who has been kidnapped by arch-villain Julian Wall.

name: Springfield Rifle
summary_text: Major Lex Kearney becomes the North's first counterespionage agent as he tries to discover who's behind the theft of Union cavalry horses in Colorado during the Civil War.

name: Små citroner gula
summary_text: LOVE AND LEMONS is a romantic comedy about love, friendship and the courage it takes to follow your dreams. The movie is based on the successful novel with the same title by author Kajsa ...                See full summary »

name: Mutual Appreciation
summary_text: Alan is a musician who leaves a busted-up band for New York, and a new musical voyage. He tries to stay focused and fends off all manner of distractions, including the attraction to his good friend's girlfriend.

name: Kiss Tomorrow Goodbye
summary_text: Starting with a violent prison break, clever, ruthless Ralph Cotter corrupts everyone around him.

name: Monolith
summary_text: A mother and her son plan a surprise visit to Los Angeles to see her husband/his father. Halfway there they get into a terrible accident in the middle of nowhere and now must fight to survive.

name: Memories of the Sword
summary_text: While in medieval Korea, a young girl sets out to revenge the betrayal and the death of her mother. But therefore she must face one of the most powerful men and warriors of the Goryo Dynasty.

name: Long nga
summary_text: A female cop befriends a mysterious martial arts drifter, who turns out to be a deadly assassin.

name: Cuore sacro
summary_text: Irene, a workaholic, is forced to re-evaluate her priorities after the suicide of her two best friends.

name: Minä ja Morrison
summary_text: A young drifting woman finds love that is not what it first seems.

name: The Book of Life
summary_text: The end of the millenium has taken on a certain significance in modern day prophecies. What happens if Jesus Christ has second thoughts about the Apocalypse? It is December 31, 1999 and New...                See full summary »

name: The Man Who Cheated Himself
summary_text: A veteran homicide detective who has witnessed his socialite girlfriend kill her husband sees his inexperienced brother assigned to the case.

name: The Naughty Nineties
summary_text: When their captain is swindled out of his riverboat by a trio of gamblers, stage show star Abbott and his bumbling sidekick Costello must put things right.

name: Daddy
summary_text: Spanning the 1970s and 1980s, this is the sensational true story of Arun Gawli, who grew up in Mumbai's impoverished Dagdi Chawl, to become a dreaded don, politician and rival of India's most powerful crime boss, Dawood Ibrahim.

name: Safelight
summary_text: A teenage boy and girl discover a renewed sense of possibility as they go on a road trip to photograph lighthouses along the California coast.

name: Spirit
summary_text: Raghunandan is an ex-Bank of England employee who resigned his lucrative job because he was bored with the rather sedentary and mundane nature of his work. he chose journalism as his next ...                See full summary »

name: Mother
summary_text: Akiko (Masami Nagasawa) is a single mother and her son is Shuhei (Sho Gunji). Akiko casually has sex with other men, including Ryo (Sadao Abe). Akiko is the only person whom Shuhei can rely on. One day, Shuhei makes a shocking decision.

name: The Big Town
summary_text: J.C. Cullen arrives in Chicago and, with his cool hand, becomes a top dice roller. But when he meets a beautiful dancer, his luck may have finally run out - her husband is a ruthless killer.
